meanings.sent1: The mushrooms were hypogeous, hidden beneath the soil.
meanings.sent2: Some plants have hypogeous roots that help them absorb nutrients from deep underground.
meanings.sent3: The hypogeous creatures threw a surprise underground party.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like hypogeous roots, deeply rooted and hidden from view.
meanings.sent5: The treasure was buried in a hypogeous chamber, waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: Developing below the surface of the ground.
meanings.sent1: The hypogeous seeds sprouted quietly beneath the earth.
meanings.sent2: The farmer planted the hypogeous bulbs deep in the soil.
meanings.sent3: The hypogeous project slowly took shape out of sight.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship grew like hypogeous roots, strong and unseen.
meanings.sent5: The hypogeous crystals formed deep within the cave, untouched by light.

meanings.sent1: The hypogeous animals rarely ventured above ground.
meanings.sent2: The cave paintings depicted the hypogeous creatures that dwelled below.
meanings.sent3: The hypogeous civilization thrived beneath the surface of the planet.
meanings.sent4: Their secrets lay buried in the hypogeous depths of the underground city.
meanings.sent5: The explorer discovered a new species in the hypogeous caverns, hidden from the world above.
